nodes.text: Verisin was a world located within the star system of the same name, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Bajic sector. Around the year 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of the Tenloss Coalition, a criminal organization specializing in contract kidnapping.

Verisin was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Verisin system, and therefore the world Verisin, in grid square P-17.
